---
labels: ['react', 'generator', 'component templates']
description: 'Component generator templates for React'
---

These generator kit includes templates used by the @bitdev [React environment](https://bit.cloud/bitdev/react/react-env).

- Vite app.
- React UI component.
- React hooks.
- Basic JavaScript templates.

API:

```ts
ReactComponentTemplate.from(options: ReactComponentTemplateOptions = {}): ReactComponentTemplate
ReactHookTemplate.from(options: ReactHookTemplateOptions = {}): ReactHookTemplate
ReactContextTemplate.from(options: ReactContextTemplateOptions = {}): ReactContextTemplate
ReactAppTemplate.from(options: ReactAppTemplateOptions = {}): ReactAppTemplate
ReactJSComponentTemplate.from(options: ReactJSComponentTemplateOptions = {}): ReactJSComponentTemplate
ReactEnvTemplate.from(options: ReactEnvTemplateOptions = {}): ReactEnvTemplate
```
